title: Good Omens Behind the Scenes | Prime Video
author: Amazon Prime Video
comment: Watch Good Omens now exclusively with your Prime Membership: http://bit.ly/GoodOmensPrimeVideo

Jon Hamm: "Why they decided to cast me I have no idea."
Me: UM because you literally have the face of a God/Angel

I am literally screaming.
David Tennent as the Sassiest Being Alive, Micheal Sheen as the King of Beige, John Hamm is the Prettiest Badass-!
I AM SO FREAKING HAPPY MY GOD.
Huh, I never realised that pratchet  and his neil looked so similiar to their angel/demon counterparts! Makes sense.

1:16 (Aziraphale is tied to an office chair for a scene)
Me: O_O raises hand Um, hi, I have a few questions....
description:
Go inside the production of the Good Omens TV show, a new series based on the beloved book by Terry Pratchett and Neil Gaiman. #GoodOmens. Streaming now on Prime Video.
